Colin Powell thinks that America "isn't quite post-racial" at this time. "These problems still exist in post-racial America." At practice Wednesday, Michael Vick loosened up throwing passes to Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan, who is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time, he said. "I like what they're doing in the offense and it's been easy.
